description: Accessory Power'sGOgroovePanda Palis a compact, portable, powerful, and fun way to listen to music almost anywhere! Simply power up with 3x AAA batteries (not included) or through a USB cable (included) and your ready for an audio adventure! Conveniently designed with a 3.5mm stow away cable so your Panda is not only tidy but super portable!Join Accessory Power in Supporting Pandas InternationalIn efforts to support the non-profit organization dedicated to the preservation of the Giant Panda and its habitat, Accessory Power will donate 5% of net profits from sales of the Panda Pal Speaker through October 31st! Buy a Panda Pal today and join us in supporting Accessory Power and Pandas International!Tech Specs:Dimensions: 3.7" x 3.7" x 2.75"Speakers: 2 x 1W RMSDrivers: 1.5" x 2 high excursion driversAudio input: Standard 3.5mm headphone plugPower: USB 5 volt, or 3 AAA batteries (not included)Works with:Laptops, Mac, Netbooks & Desktop Computers:Macbook, Macbook Pro, Acer, Apple, ASUS, Compaq, Dell, Gateway, HP, Lenovo, Toshiba, Samsung, SonyMP3 players:Creative Zen/ Zen X-Fi/ Zen MX/ Zen Mosaic/ Zune/ Zune HD/ Sony Walkman/ Sandisk Sansa/ Sansa Clip/ Sansa Fuze/ Samsung Galaxy Player 3.6, 4.0 , 4.2 , 5.0 / iPod Touch/ iPod Nano/ iPod Classic/ iPod ShuffleTablets:Acer Iconica:A100 / A500 / A510 / A700Apple:iPad , 2 , 3Arnova:ChildpadASUS:Nexus 7 / Transformer TF300 , TF201 , TF101Blackberry:PlaybookCoby:Kyros MID-7033 , 7035 , 7042 , 9742 , 1024 , 1042 , 1125Pandigital:Star R70B200 / SuperNova R80B400Samsung:Galaxy Tab 2 10.1 , 8.9 , 7.7 , 7.0ToshibaExcite 10 , X10 / Thrive 7Smartphones:HTC , iPhone 4S , 4 , 3GS , 3G / Motorola / Samsung / BlackBerry / T-Mobile / LG / Pantech / Sony Ericsson / Nokia
title: GOgroove Panda Portable LED Laptop Speaker Groove Pal Jr. with Enhanced Bass Woofer and USB Cable - Works With Microsoft Surface Pro 3 , Apple iPad 4 , Samsung Galaxy NotePRO 12.2 and More Tablets!
